VP Technology & Chief Consultant, Essentia Corp, Houston, TX Oct ‘08-Current

Providing leadership and guidance to Owners and Managers in various industries such as Petroleum Refining, Trucking Business, Contractor shops, and Printing business. Worked in Sales, Operations and Finance areas of businesses which are in turnaround/restructuring mode. Improved cash flow using Daily Cash Management Tool, increased Sales Leads, and more importantly, the Operations, by improving quality, productivity, cash flow cycle, product flows using techniques such as 5S, pull systems, and SMED. Clients included large companies such as Marathon Petroleum, Forterra Building Products, Generac, Igloo, Indo-Shell Group, Gardner-Denver, Applied MSS and MRC Global. Also worked with several smaller privately owned businesses doing contracting (buildings, electrical, plumbing, trucking, home healthcare, trucking, and printing).
